title: The game where you can't land a single skillshot...

replies.body: Wow big noob... i never miss my skillshots with katarina
And I never miss mine with Gangplank.
I can never hit mine with Master Yi.
The one champ I always miss my skillshots with is Vladimir.
I can't even land my skill shots with Tryndamere. :(
Warwick is the worst
I will never be able to master Shaco.
I have trouble landing {{champion:86}}'s ult.
Yeah his ult is really hard to land. For exemple, when i cast it and the enemy is out of my vision. The ability cancel just like old {{champion:51}}  ult before it got fixed.
I keep missing those heals with Soraka
His E is kinda a skillshot though...
Kinda and almost only work in horse shoes and hand grenades.
Remember the game Dyrus watered the trees with his ult?  Vlad does have a skill shot.  Garen on the other hand. >_>

I never miss with Pantheon. 

Cept when I target a minion.

> [{quoted}](name=Daedalus871,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f4HVeuio,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-22T00:26:51.185+0000)
>
> I can never hit mine with Master Yi.

PFFFFFF i never hit mine with Annie.

> [{quoted}](name=Squidsmastah,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=f4HVeuio,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-10-22T00:21:47.111+0000)
>
> And I never miss mine with Gangplank.

Well if you're counting the barrels that's actually pretty insane. They don't even move, they just stand there and look incredibly obvious.

{{champion:55}} is way to easy to land her skillshots with.

Try {{champion:62}} for a real challenge.
Hit mine about 70% of the time with {{champion:14}}

{{champion:10}} 

How can I even tell?

http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/rvb/images/a/a6/Church_S10.png/revision/latest?cb=20120704223035
"Honestly, I can relate to that." - Church

CONGRATULATIONS!

http://i.imgur.com/G9Y3bEC.jpg

You've earned it son, don't be shy take it.
I'm not having trouble landing it on a target. I'm having trouble landing it on **THE** target.
I really appreciate that they fired 6 times
If I miss a skillshot but I kill someone else I would say calculated
I once missed my Q is Karma, but killed a stealthed Shaco I didn't even know was there.
I missed my pull on Blitz one time and grabbed a stealth Teemo into our tower that was apparently camping there for like 2 minutes lol.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/826/353/c93.jpg
Me as Ahri. Then I pick Malzahar the next game in shame.
{{champion:67}} Skill shots are so hard

I don't get it what's a skillshot?
{{champion:1}}
Someone should make a troll account and name it 'StormTroper-8" and intentionally wiff every ability.

No matter how much he eats, no matter how big he gets, I can't believe I can't land a single shot on {{champion:31}}

{{champion:31}} "My, it seems you weren't meant for marksmenship."
When i play destiny...
Literally me whenever I play Nidalee.
Trying to hit {{champion:103}}'s E
Even if you miss your target, you still hit something, like the air or ground. So technically everyone has a 100% accuracy, but no one questions what was hit.   XD
I'm generally about 50-50 with {{champion:43}}

I actually missed my skillshot with Kindred.

Stupid 3 enemy minions were bunching up all over the enemy, how do I land Q nao <.<

When I cant lane my skill shot. they must be smurfing.  ;/

(literally)-lol

Me every game.

I swear I deserve challenjour
I always land my skillshots, but the enemy is so tanky that it did no damage looking like I missed it.
